bibl.author: A. J. Falls
bibl.title: A. J. Falls to Cornelius Cole, 22 December 1870
bibl.idno: Entry 10, Record Group 60, Letter Book H

revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I have the honor to acknowledge the receipt of your letter of the 21st inst. and to inform you that the compensation of W. W. Morrow, Esq. the Assistant Attorney of the United States for California was increased to four thousand dollars per annum, ($4000) to take effect on and after the first proximo.
body.note: pay of W. W. Morrow, Ass't. U. S. Atty, Cal.
